# Speed Kings (film)

| runtime        =
| country        = United States
| language       = Silent filmEnglish intertitles

Speed Kings is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy.
Plot
Cast
* Bobby Burns - Pokes
* Walter Stull - Jabbs
* Billy Ruge
* Ethel Marie Burton
* Oliver Hardy - (as Babe Hardy)
* Frank Hanson
* Edna Reynolds
